title: Smart Data Models - ExcAC5A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE AC5A alternator-supplied rectifier excitation system with different minimum controller output.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcAC5A

a.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient to allow different usage of the model (a).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

efd1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (Efd1).  Typical Value = 5.6. Default: 0.0

efd2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (Efd2).  Typical Value = 4.2. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 400. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gains (Kf).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0.0

ks.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

seefd1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Efd1 (S[Efd1]).  Typical Value = 0.86. Default: 0.0

seefd2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Efd2 (S[Efd2]).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0

tf1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf1).  Typical Value  = 1. Default: 0

tf2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf2).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0

tf3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 7.3. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value =-7.3. Default: 0.0
